title: Movie Mania
excerpt: Creating a movie using React and the MovieDB API.
body: Our group is using react to create the website for a movie selection page. This page includes: watch later and favorites which will store them in 2 separate lists. There is also a filter for the movies and a search query. All movies data are being taken from the movieDB API

title: Hangman Game
body: For this Javacript game, I want to create a game that was borth simple and challenging. After speaking to friends and family, they all mentioned they enjoyed playing wordle but they would've like to see the definitions for the word of the day. So after I decided to create hangman with the addition to provide the definition when the round is concluded. I used an API from Datamuse which has both words and definitions. I then filtered out any words that had special characters and spaces.

title: News Site Homepage
excerpt: Creating a group portfolio project using React.
body: Our group decided to use react to be able to divide up the work more evenly and to also give a better layout for constructing the page. We also uses SASS for designing the page which also made it easier to divide the work.

title: Tourism Site
excerpt: Group project for our hand in git and collaboration in HTML and CSS.
body: Fro this project the group divided the work by managing pages
